content: I build dependable {{backend platforms}} and cloud-native systems that keep products fast, observable, and secure.
I currently lead platform engineering at {{ByteBakers}}, guiding teams through migrations from monoliths to event-driven services and mentoring engineers along the way.
My focus is pairing {{reliability}} with developer velocity through automation, infrastructure-as-code, and thoughtful architecture.
Tooling sweet spots: {{Go}}, {{TypeScript}}, {{PostgreSQL}}, Terraform, Kubernetes, and AWS.
I love designing feedback loops around {{observability}}, CI/CD, and security so shipping stays predictable.
Outside of work you‚Äôll find me sharing notes on technical leadership, contributing to open source utilities, or iterating on personal SaaS ideas.
Let‚Äôs connect on LinkedIn or explore my repos on GitHub.
